nodes.documentation: @title Ownable contract.
nodes.name: Ownable

nodes.documentation: @dev Default constructor stores owner's address
@dev MODIFIER to checks if the msg.sender is the owner of the contract
nodes.name: onlyOwner

nodes.documentation:
@dev Transfers ownership to another address
@param newOwner Address of the new owner.
nodes.name: transferOwnership

nodes.documentation: @title Stoppable contract. Inherits from Ownable
nodes.name: Stoppable

nodes.documentation: @dev Event to notify about market status change
nodes.name: marketStopped

nodes.documentation: @dev Default constructor sets the default state
@dev CIRCUIT BREAKER PATTERN: Allows owner to stop the marketplace
nodes.name: changeMarketState

nodes.documentation: @dev MODIFIER to check if marketplace is active
nodes.name: checkMarketStatus

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns current state of market
nodes.name: getMarketState

nodes.documentation: @title Market admin contract. Inherits from Ownable and Stoppable
nodes.name: MarketAdmin
getUserType

nodes.documentation: @dev MODIFIER that checks if the msg.sender is an admin
nodes.name: onlyAdmin

nodes.documentation: @dev MODIFIER that checks if the msg.sender is an admin
nodes.name: onlyStoreOwner

nodes.documentation: @dev Event to notify about new admin
nodes.name: adminAdded

nodes.documentation: @dev Event to notify about new store owner
nodes.name: storeownerAdded

nodes.documentation: @dev Market owner can add other admins for the marketplace
nodes.name: addAdmin

nodes.documentation:
@dev Market admin and market owner can add new store owners 
@param _storeowner Address of the new owner.
nodes.name: addStoreOwner
isAdmin
isStoreOwner

nodes.documentation:
@dev Gets list of all admins.
@return address[]. Array of admins.
nodes.name: getAdmins

nodes.documentation:
@dev Gets list of all store owners.
@return address[]. Array of store owners.
